articles.title: US hunts missing Americans after Mexico kidnapping - BBC
articles.description: The unidentified US citizens crossed the border to purchase medication, Mexico's president says.
articles.content:
The US and Mexico are searching for four Americans who were kidnapped in north-eastern Mexico last week.
